page.title: 16RECREATION
page.content: In Bowburn there is a park with 4 tennis courts 1 bowling green(you may hire the bowls)1 putting green(you are supplied with the putting stick and golf ball).There is a dressing room which has showers,for the Hare and Greyhound footballers.The ground is next to the dressing rooms.In the grounds there is a football pitch marked out and a cricket pitch. When the football is in season the football posts are put up and the footballers play on Sundays.It is League match. In the park there are 4 tennis courts which are fairly good,the prices are 20 pence for 30 minutes and 40 pence for 1 hour.The prices for bowls is 20 pence for 1 hour. { { { {
